#include<queue>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long 


struct comp
{
	bool operator() (const LL &a , const LL & b)
    {
	  return a<b;
     }
};


struct comp1
{
	bool operator() (const int &a , const int & b)
    {
	  return a>b;
    }
};

priority_queue<LL,vector<LL>,comp>m_MaxHeap;
priority_queue<LL,vector<LL>,comp1>m_MinHeap;
int main()
{
//	freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	LL N;
	scanf("%llu\n",&N);
	LL i = 0;
	LL x = 0;
	int a = 0;
	int elementcount = 0;
	while(i < N)
	{
		scanf("%d ",&a);
		if ( a== 1) {
			elementcount++;
			scanf("%llu\n",&x);
			int tmp = 0;
			if (elementcount %3 != 0) {
				if ( m_MinHeap.size() != 0 && m_MinHeap.top() < x)
				{
					tmp = m_MinHeap.top();
					m_MinHeap.pop();
					m_MaxHeap.push(tmp);
					m_MinHeap.push(x);

				}
				else {
					m_MaxHeap.push(x);
				}
			}
			else {

					m_MaxHeap.push(x);
					tmp = m_MaxHeap.top();
					m_MaxHeap.pop();
					m_MinHeap.push(tmp);
			}
		}
		else if ( a == 2)
		{
					
			if ( m_MinHeap.size() == 0)
			{
				printf("No reviews yet\n");
			}
			else {
				printf("%llu\n",m_MinHeap.top());
			}

		}
		i++;
	}

	return 0;
}
